profile.name: Ignacio
profile.title: Blockchain & Full Stack Developments (Web2, Web3, Digital Developments, Smart Contracts, Dapps, Traceability Applications, Fintech, RegTech & PropTech )
profile.description:
Blockchain and Full Stack Developer with expertise in Web2, Web3, Smart Contracts, and Fintech. Proven track record in designing intuitive user experiences, collaborating in cross-functional teams, and driving product growth. MIT Certified in Fintech Innovation.

Key Highlights:
- MIT Certificate in Fintech Innovation, forefront at Blockchain Innovation.
- 42 Madrid Alumni.
- Developer Smart Contracts and Decentralized Applications (Dapps) on Ethereum Virtual Machines, Hyperledger.
- Led web and app tech design efforts resulting in improved user experiences and increased user engagement.
- Strong product ownership skills, ensuring seamless collaboration between cross-functional teams and adherence to Scrum/Agile methodologies.
- Proficient in UI design, striking the perfect balance between aesthetics and functionality.

Technical Proficiencies:
- Languages and Frameworks: Solidity, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Angular, React, Bash, Shell, C
- Tools and Technologies: Hardhat, Truffle, Foundry, Moralis, Infura, Alchemy, Pinata, ENS names
- Real-Time Databases and Cloud Computing: Firebase, IBM Cloud, Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Digital Ocean.
- LLM´s AI Solutions.
- SaaS, PaaS Solutions.
- Vectorial, Relational and Non-relational Databases
- Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (CI/CD-GIT) with Version Controls systems.

Marketing Skills:
- Data-driven mindset, employing metrics and KPIs to steer growth strategies and maximize performance.
- Creative thinker, adept at generating innovative ideas and conducting A/B testing to optimize web, app, and platforms.
- Analytical data, extracting valuable insights from user feedback and data to inform decision-making
- Collaborative approach, facilitating effective communication and information exchange with product, marketing, and C-level teams
- Proven ability to drive website and social media traffic, employing omni-channel marketing tactics and leveraging the AARRR Sales Metrics Diagram (Acquisition – Activation – Retention – Referral - Revenue)
- E-commerce proficiency, utilizing Google Analytics, Magento, Oscommerce, Prestashop, WordPress, SEO, SEM, and SMO for impactful campaigns
- Skilled in community management across various social media platforms.

Additional Skills:
- Mastery in Unix, OS X, Windows.
- Exceptional written and spoken English skills with a native level of fluency and negotiation capabilities
- Spanish as a mother tongue.
- Out-of-the-box thinking and intellectual horsepower, consistently driving innovation and problem-solving

challenges.description:
Desarrollo de Sistemas de Inteligencia Artificial: Especialización en RAG, Agentic, prompting, Fine-Tuning, y latencia de inferencia.
Computación en la Nube con AWS: Implementación y gestión de soluciones en la nube utilizando Amazon Web Services.
DevOps: Automatización y optimización de procesos de desarrollo y operaciones.
Bases de Datos Vectoriales: Experiencia con Neo4j para el manejo de grandes volúmenes de datos.
Desarrollo Web: Utilización de frameworks como D3.js y Next.js para la creación de aplicaciones web dinámicas e interactivas.
API´s = > Fast-API Python: Desarrollo de aplicaciones y scripts en Python para diversas aplicaciones, desde análisis de datos hasta automatización de tareas.

- Dapps: Distributed Applications & Developments
- Tokenomics-Cryptoeconomics
- Smart Contracts using Solidity as Programming Language
- Hyperledger Fabric Solutions.
- Docker, Kubernetes.
- Cryptocurrencies-NFT´s over the Ethereum Blockchain and Binance Smart Chain

- import and export activities all around Europe and South America.

- Branding and Community Management ( SEO, SEM, CRM´s).
- Ecommerce (Magento, OsCommerce, WordPress).
- Advertising and Public Relations, organizing trade fairs and events for the brand.

- Based in Spain company, with wholesale business of frozen seafood
- Import and Export activities and with contracts with countries such Chile, Argentina, Japan, Holland, India.

Company part of CESCE Corp. Specialized on financial and comercial information , with activities such data treatment, and publishing financial and commercial reports on different companies sectors, credits and risks.
Sales department, direct sales of insurances and financial products.

studies.name: Fintech Certificate Course: Future Commerce 2016, Finance and Technology

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
Looking for a job in a tech company working with web3 (Blockchain-Smart Contracts) but also I can develop also in Web2 projects.
Since 2009 I began my journey in development with Ecommerce systems first and after in 2016, I participated in a course at MIT (Massachusset Institute  of Technology) about Fintech and the future of commerce, in this course is where I learned about the DLT tech and the new paradigm of the Internet of Money, and since then, this Web3 area is one of my priorities. I also like very much programming and learning new stacks, so I thing I could adapt very well in an IT company.
